bug.author: madanadit
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.1.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug An unrecognized journal entry is simply ignored. To Reproduce
Write a journal entry newly added in v2.x Read journal from v2.y < v2.x Master starts up successfully
Expected behavior Master should crash with IllegalStateException as a journal entry was unrecognized Urgency Medium, this an an early detection of journal compatibility Additional context EmbeddedJournal calls JournalAssociation and will throw an IllegalStateException whereas UfsJournal does not

comments.comment: UfsJournal did/does not need the JournalAssociation method, since each master reads its own journal files, so all those entries are known to belong to the that specific master.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/blob/master/core/server/common/src/main/java/alluxio/master/journal/ufs/UfsJournalCheckpointThread.java#L178>https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/blob/master/core/server/common/src/main/java/alluxio/master/journal/ufs/UfsJournalCheckpointThread.java#L178</denchmark-link> ignores the return value, which should signify if the master recognizes the entry or not.
